All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Bits
Represents a number of bits.
CPU
Representation of the Chip-8 CPU.
CPUState
Representation of the Chip-8 CPU state.
Emulator
Representation of the entire Chip-8 machine.
Interpreter
Handles Chip-8 instruction processing.
Keypad
Representation of the Chip-8 16-key keypad.
MemoryBlock
A block of memory representing an array of Bytes.
Register
Representation of a single register that can store a specified number of bits.
ROM
Representation of a block of read-only memory containing byte data, where each register in the block is one byte.
Screen
Represents a Chip-8 screen.
Sprites
Contains some sprite-specific functions for loading sprite data and looking up addresses that point to sprites.
StackEmptyException
An exception that is thrown when the CPU's subroutine stack is empty and tries to be popped.
StackFullException
An exception that is thrown when the CPU's subroutine stack is full and is attempted to be pushed to.
UnsupportedInstructionException
An exception that is thrown when an unsupported instruction is provided to the interpreter.
